description:
Lum and Ten run into a axe-swinging, flying-bear-riding, lost little boy who is part of a rather interesting class of preschoolers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aki no Sora Kara Kintarou! / Takumashiku Ikirun`yaa!
Il bambino nell`aquilone - Il senso della vita
Kintaro from the Autumn Sky / Gonna Live Like a Man
Un bébé descendu du ciel / Je vais vivre comme un homme
秋の空から 金太郎! - たくましく 生きるんやっ!
